title: Mathematics Learning Design to Enhance Self-Regulated Learning in Blended Environments

context.additional_context: Customized mathematics learning course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Monitors learning outcomes and provides feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can develop self-regulated learning plans based on learning analytics data in blended learning environments
Learners can maintain learning engagement at 80% or higher using self-regulated learning support tools (e.g., progress checklists, personalized notifications) within the LMS
Learners can improve self-regulated learning strategies through weekly reflective journaling and feedback incorporation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
